reviews.text: Nice food. Very tasty and nice combo with rice. The deserts are also very nice.
Have to come here with a group and get the tomato broth
good food
Great place! Very delicious food and good service. Reasonable price. Will come back
æ¨èï¼
Get the tomato based soup!
Very favorable. Lots of options for appetizers. Foods are very delicious ğŸ˜‹

Tomato broth bliss with beef and fish!!
We ordered the tomato soup base combo for two at B2J Tasty Potâ€”and it fed three of us easily! The portion was generous, with two sides and two rice included, making it a fantastic value. The tomato broth was rich and flavorful, and the combo of beef and fish was surprisingly perfectâ€”hearty, fresh, and super satisfying. Every bite felt comforting and well-balanced. Definitely one of the best hot pot experiences weâ€™ve had in a while. Weâ€™ll be back for sure!
Delicious good service combo
Great food and great service ğŸ˜‹
Amazon fish
Love the food. We ordered the 2-person combo, absolutely worth the price. Will come back again!!!
Highly recommendedã€‚very delicious
Good service, good amount of food for two combo deal. I got the mild spicy soup with beef and fish which was great! Also the chilli chicken side also tasted amazing!
Delicious food with good service
Love this place!! Iâ€™ve been coming here since it opened, and the food quality is always great. Highly recommend!
so delicious and reasonable price for two people combo! Love it !
Excellent food and Service, will come back again, recommended
Delicious hot pot! The fish tasted fresh and the side dishes like the fried chicken was good too.
Food was very good, the fish was super fresh and delicious. Also the service is good and waiter is super nice
Had the meal for two. Ended up eating it all.
The fish is really tender and tasty. Been here many times already â€” flavorâ€™s always on point and the service is super nice. Love this place!
Fried pork belly is a must.  Delicious, will come again
Tables are nice and spacious. Food is very fresh and delicious. We ordered the tomato broth with beef.  The beef is very smooth and tasty. I highly recommend this place.
Great food, highly recommended. I come here all the time.
So good! Loved the combo for two with the beef balls fish and beef, wide noodles, and added fried fish skin as a side! Definitely recommend. Portion was huge we had leftovers after and were so full!

authentic chengdu style food. Itâ€™s like having food in China
one of the best spicy sour fish nearby. cozy and delicious. will definitely come back!!!
Highly recommended! We came here lots of times!
Great vibes and food! Chili chicken was delicious
The place is very nice Iâ€™d want to come by here again
It tastes very very good, plus it have a very nice place to eat
å‘³é“å¾ˆä¸é”™
Good food and fast service. I come here everyone once in while when I need a quick soupy fix
Very good taste, the fish are very fresh and the soup base are tasteful
Great authentic Chinese taste.
Great delicious food!!! Highly recommend!!!
Food is delicious.  Love the Chinese sauerkraut fish.  Very authentic!
Yummy food and pretty quick service.

First time attempting this restaurant for Sauerkraut fish. The food is alright but could be better on the flavor on the soup. One thing the day I came here was the seating I were at there were no air conditioners not on. Especially, on a humidity day and eating spicy food (mild), if A/C were not on that's ridiculous. My wife and I were sweating seating there. Not sure if their A/C were malfunction or they don't want to turn it on because there are not much people in the store. But I felt like the that's not right. Summer day, no A/C, it's not worth to come.
I recommend you guys bring an electric fan or regular fan to be use.
Having dinner on weekend. Ordered the fish dish for 2 and came with 2 side orders. Portion is good for 3 people. Taste good and will come back again.

Interesting experience. We are soup lovers especially at the cold winter days. Ordered the sour spicy fish soup. 2 very friendly servers was coming to help us. It was our first time here. Yesterday it was only for 2 of us we ordered the small size,(more than enough for 2 I took the rest home) big wow for the to go box.
The atmosphere gorgeous we love it. The soup is very rich in flavors,we never had anything like this before. The fish was very fresh,delicious tofu so-so,the base a unique flavor.The place definitely for groups. Kinda pricey for 2 people for soup.

Large quantities and yummy food! We got 2 combos for two for 6 ppl and it was more than enough food. We got the classic spice with bean curd and king oyster mushrooms, chicken wings, and pork belly. We also got the tomato soup with fish and beef with lotus root and wide noodles plus milk custard and spicy noodles. Would come again!

Signature hot pot dish is the best. Not too spicy or mild, friendly to the common taste. Combo deal comes w two sides and rice making it a fair deal for the price. Server was fun and so kind! Definitely would come back

Spicy fish pot with many add ons ğŸ‘ğŸ‘

The large fish pot for 4 was enormous and likely good for 5-6 people.

$125 included 4 add ons & 4 side dishes. The fragrant rice was of the highest quality.

Beers for $3.99 is fantastic value to off set the spicy flavor.

Very comfortable leather lounge seats & vibes.
An enjoyable experience overall and highly recommended. ğŸ™ğŸ»
Absolutely delicious. Too delicious for words, as a matter of fact!ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ğŸ˜‹ You should definitely visit. Hope you enjoy! I just really enjoyed the tomato flavored fish!
Amazing food and great service! Even the small pot had a great portion. Loved the fish and crispy fried pork belly especially.

Date of visit was 2/7/25. Located along Bell Blvd, they have the signature spicy / sour dish. I got the combination that has the beef and the fish. The small is good for 2 people. 3 people sharing it is kind of a stretch. Would recommend, especially during cold winter nights. Their TO GO container is sealed and spill proof! The container is a aluminum bowl, and the top is hot sealed aluminum cover (like how they seal bubble teas). Then it is placed on a cardboard platform with strings so it is always leveled when you carry it.
Great place to visit, if you love fish. They also offer fried chicken wings, fried buns and much more. Very good dining experience, love the decorations and service was very good!

I recently visited B2J Tasty Pot and had a fantastic dining experience! The spicy sour fish was absolutely delicious, with just the right balance of flavors. The side dishes were also amazing, especially the chicken feet and the spicy chicken dish, both of which were packed with flavor.

The service was exceptional as well. Our server was very attentive, constantly refilling our water and making sure we had everything we needed. The air conditioning was strong, which was a great relief on a hot day.

Overall, it was a wonderful meal, and I will definitely be coming back!

My wife just picked up the order, the reception didn't get my order right. And I am positive I ordered half and half, and the flavor is extra spicy. He insisted I ordered this, I dont know where did it get wrong,  because we been dine in since the restaurant was opened, extra spicy is only favor we have been ordered. Everything was so right when the waitress serving us. This guy did ruined my dinner.

Recently came because I wanted to try this fish soup for the first time. We got the combo for 2 with classic spice level with lotus root and enoki mushroom in it. It was amazing. Savory and sour- you just have to try it for yourself. We also got cucumber salad and fried pork belly as the sides. Fried pork belly was 10/10 but I would say the cucumber salad was very average. Atmosphere is great, food great

However, service not the best. Took 10 minutes of constantly trying to get the serverâ€™s attention just for the check.

we had the small spicy beef with noodles and tofu skin, and the small classic sauerkraut fish with noodles and enoki mushroom. both soups were delicious with a lot of ingredients inside. the side dishes were all very flavorful - we had the pickled chicken feet, cold chicken with chili sauce, fried pork belly, and spicy sour fern noodles. we will definitely be back for more!
The fish is very fresh and the soup is perfectly numbing. I highly recommend the chili oil chicken and the fungus salad. Itâ€™s delicious! (This is a photo of AFTER we destroyed the food ğŸ˜…)

We got the 2 person combo which comes with your choice of soup base, 2 add ons, 2 side dishes and 2 rice. Honestly everything was great and super filling. We got the original soup base + spam + king oyster mushroom and for the sides the chicken in spicy sauce and the spicy fern noodles.

The soup was perfect, there was a good amount of beef and fish which is def a plus when youâ€™re eating with your bf that only likes protein. The soup base was a great blend of sour and spicy. I personally canâ€™t eat toooo much spice so I really liked that. (They do have a spicer option too)

In terms of the sides, I loveeedd the chicken. I always get steamed chicken in spicy sauce in every Szechuan restaurant I go to. (In search for one similar to my favorite restaurant that has now closed down). The one here was the closest Iâ€™ve ever gotten, will def be back just for this side tbh.

The spicy fern noodle was good, but not my fav personally.

Lastly the milk mochi is sooo good and refreshing after the meal.

The service was also a 10/10, super attentive and very quick.

Overall, loved everything about this restaurant!

PS peep how cute the togo packaging is for the sauerkraut soup.

Came for a date night and was pleasantly surprised. We have tried many places that offer pickled, sour and spicy fish soup. Flushing has always been our go to, but now we have a new restaurant where it's not too busy to bring our family. Def recommend, and the takeout box is cute as my wife says.

This is an amazing sauerkraut fish place! From the food to service, everything is top-notch! Hands down some of the best service Iâ€™ve received at an NYC restaurant. The two person set menu is more than enough to leave my wife and I stuffed. Would definitely come back!

We order 3 ppl set, classic version
The fish pot is a bit spicy but we love it
Crispy Fried Pork Belly is the MUST
cucumber salad is tasty too
We got Milk Mochi for free if u left comment to 2 ppl on wechat, line or google
Cant miss the Milk Mochi!
Def will come back again

Service is super friendly!!

We got their signature sauerkraut with fish and ooooooh boy it was so good. The fish is really fresh (doesnâ€™t taste frozen so I assume they use fresh fish??). Their chili chicken side dish and black fungus salad is also incredible. All around delicious and the waitress is very kind and attentive. Iâ€™m definitely coming back.
Also the takeout container is so innovative. They said you only have to put on the stove to reheat it.

TAKE OUT:
I had a great dine in experience with stellar service with this female employee and the food was delicious so I wanted to get take out.

This male employee kept telling me â€œno noâ€ even though I was pointing at the menu and I couldnt even make an order.

Craving was strong, so I ordered delivery on Uber eats. The food was not even prepared by the time my uber eats cyclist got to the restaurant. They proceeded to make him wait 10 more minutes. Fine, that happens, no biggie.

I finally got the food delivered but as you can see from the picture, the â€œsmall potâ€ order, which is supposed to be 1lbs was not even close, barely took up half of the container. This is barely even half of the dine-in amount. The taste was also not even half as good as the dine in experience. I will definitely not be ordering out from here again.
We got spicy & non spicy. Enoki mushroom is good. JalapeÃ±o with century egg is surprisingly good. Takoyaki. Chicken wings. Fried pork belly. All good ğŸ˜Š
Very authentic and delicious traditional Chinese dish made here. Our in-laws just came from China to visit us and they love this place a lot!

The portion is huge! We got the combo for 2 and we had leftover for next day! Itâ€™s a win win!  We got the spicy sour with fish and beef. Their chicken gizzard is a MUSTT! The decor inside is amazing!

You get to build your own bowl, starting with the soup base, then the toppings you want. The tomato soup base was flavorful and rich. We got the combo for two with two side dishes. The fried chicken wings were crisp and delicious. The lotus root had a sweet rice filling inside, I would prefer the lotus root to be a bit more crunchy.
